channel.title: Are spawn servers pointless now since runescape is nothing like spawn servers?
channel.description: I'm just wondering because spawn servers use too be able to help make people better pkers without going through the real thing on runescape, yet since the new combat is out, I don't think there is really a point of having spawn servers unless you want to practice for another private server, yet will still be pointless since private servers are meant to get you those good items really fast. Just a idea out there and wondering some feed back from you guys

item.title: Are spawn servers pointless now since runescape is nothing like spawn servers?
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Spawn servers are alright, the communities are just shit as per usual, Everyone’s a god damn pking expert on them and if you don’t follow their rules you’re a noob.

Read full topic

item.title: Are spawn servers pointless now since runescape is nothing like spawn servers?
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“Krackkid, post:12, topic:517595”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=635855.msg4287286#msg4287286 date=1366577301]

[quote author=KroniKz_ link=topic=635855.msg4287276#msg4287276 date=1366575188]

spawn servers are like the United States, bloated, full of shit, and an over-inflated economy.

who the love do you think you are?
[/quote]Who the fuck are you? He may talk shit about America, but hes partly true. Any American that denies the status America is in right now is a complete dipshit.
[/quote]Who the fuck are you? Nothing he said about America is true. The USA is doing fine, we have a very peaceful nation and our money is doing good. We are the number 1 nation in the world, and always will be.
[size=1pt]In my dreams a least[/size][/quote]
Lmao.

OT: Spawn servers are good for PvP’ers.

item.source: Are spawn servers pointless now since runescape is nothing like spawn servers?

item.title: Are spawn servers pointless now since runescape is nothing like spawn servers?
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

It’s only a matter of time until a functional client is available to use with newly programmed source code following the new protocol, etc.
Your question is also a bit pointless, seeing as there are multiple RuneScape classic servers amidst and plenty of ‘old school’ servers up and about.
At the end of the day, it is all simply a matter of taste. I, for one, would gladly spend lots of available time on an old school server, but I would not spend any time on a newer revision or protocol. I say this because it is very clear how many people are attempting to ‘remake’ the next Matrix server, yet they are so divided upon each other, and that competition is dividing the players. Seeing as the majority of private servers are already mucked about by a plethora of clueless developers, it would not be fun to play on a newer-based server, and in more recent cases, the average Project-Insanity based server.

I don't think there is really a point of having spawn servers unless you want to practice for another private server
Again, a matter of taste.
be pointless since private servers are meant to get you those good items really fast.
I don't know about you, but what got me interested in playing private servers was the newfound revelation that I could now make my own RuneScape, and bend it to my whim. To expand my creativity to new boundaries, and do what I felt would be a great addition to the game. [size=7pt][i](Gosh, this is what Jagex must be feeling right now, with all of these 'old-time veterans' mucking about, saying the game is now garbage.)[/i][/size]

Read full topic
